title: Pre-Sputnik satellite-like tracks on historical plates (Villarroel et al.)
summary: Peer-reviewed analyses of mid-20th-century astronomical plates report satellite-like tracks before Sputnik; authors call for independent replication and strict artefact controls.

title: Alleged 1933 Italy recovered craft (referenced in later testimony)
summary: Historical claims and archival references concerning a purported recovered craft in Italy (early 1930s). Entry collates documents, provenance, and what later witnesses have asserted about this case.

title: Sworn testimony to lawmakers regarding UAP crash retrieval and programs (2023â€“2024)
summary: Under-oath statements by current/former government and military personnel to oversight bodies alleging crash retrieval and related programs; links to transcripts, exhibits, and follow-up leads.

title: FOIA & archival releases relevant to UAP (selected items)
summary: Curated set of declassified records and archival materials with direct links, context, and guidance on how journalists can request corroborating documents.

title: Instrumented encounters with radar/visual corroboration (selected cases)
summary: Cases with multi-sensor data (e.g., radar plus visual) and associated logs where available; focuses on provenance, data quality, and avenues for independent verification.
